Package ui

Class GameConsoleUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.GameConsoleUI
  • public class GameConsoleUI
extends java.lang.Object
    GameConsoleUI is a class that represents the user interface for the game. It handles the display of the game board, player positions, and user input.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameConsoleUI

        public GameConsoleUI()
        Constructor for the GameConsoleUI class. Initializes the game logic and scanner. Adds snakes and ladders to the game.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method to start the game.
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments

      • addSnakesAndLadders

        public void addSnakesAndLadders()
        Adds snakes and ladders to the game. Creates a HashMap for snakes and ladders using the predefined keys and values.

      • displayBoard

        public void displayBoard()
        Displays the game board. Prints the current state of the board, including player positions, snakes, and ladders.

      • printCell

        public void printCell​(int position)
        Prints the cell at the given position. If a player is on the position, prints "P1" or "P2". If both players are on the position, prints "P1P2". If the position is a snake head or tail, prints "S" or "T". If the position is a ladder bottom or top, prints "L" or "H". Otherwise, prints the position number with padding.
        Parameters:
        position - the position to print

      • isSnakeOrLadder

        public boolean isSnakeOrLadder​(int position)
        Checks if the given position is a snake or ladder.
        Parameters:
        position - the position to check
        Returns:
        true if the position is a snake or ladder, false otherwise

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Starts the game. Displays the game board and prompts the players to roll the dice. Checks if the game is over and switches turns if not.
